OOC: No one filled me in so i read a few posts, and I'll post best I
can. If I'm right, then a ship has come to take the War Machines away
right?

::Hot Rod::

He pulls away from all enemys taking a breather. He watches the CF,
collaps as the nano bots do their work.

::DrillBit::

He pulls away from the battle, and responds to DarkFate.
"I'm here, what is it?"

::Epyon::

He watches the CF collaps the city was being built.

::Dollon::

He stagered to his feet wounded, and dazed.

::Demolition::

He gets the message from Havoc, and flyes to the ship. He gets to the
ship, and climbs on board. He blasts off, and heads through the
transwarp portal, to Cybertron.

::KitKat2::

As Havoc leaves, Kitkat2 manages to escape the Alliance base. She
reaches water, and begins to swim back to the Pack base.
